first_translate: don’t try to steal someone else’s man.
because he belongs to me right now.

hangle: 이 정도에 꼬리를 말 거면 왜 시비를 거는지 몰라.
first_translate: if she was gonna run off like that, why did she even come here?

hangle: 정신 차려. 어제는 이보다 더 했잖아.
first_translate: come on! we’ve done more than this before.

hangle: 네가 하는 거랑 내가 하는 건 느낌이 다르다고….
first_translate: it feels different when you do it versus when I do it...

hangle: 그래도 그냥 입술에 가볍게 했을 뿐이잖아?
first_translate: still, all I did was brush my lips against yours lightly.
let me give up our seats...!
n-no, please don’t worry about it.
you have to prepare for tomorrow’s departure!
we will take a short break here!

hangle: 도착할 때까지 유니스 영애와 같은 마차는 절대 못 탈 거야
first_translate: now I won’t ever get to ride in lady eunis’ carriage again until we arrive at our destination.
is it such a big deal?

hangle: 좀 친해져서 유니스의 힘을 확인하려 했단 말이다.
first_translate: I wanted to become friends with her so I could check out what kind of powers she has.

hangle: 그런데 코앞에서 사람 협박하고, 사랑과 전쟁을 실시간으로 찍어버렸네…
first_translate: but then I threatened people right in front of her and had them film love and war live...
I wonder how much damage my image took from that incident...
do you like her that much...?

hangle: 티 파티 이후로 우리를 볼 때마다 발그레 해지는 것도 그렇고.
first_translate: and every time she sees us after the tea party, she blushes.
I can’t believe these two aren’t falling in love despite being set up together...

hangle: 너희 둘이 사랑을 해야 유니스가 각성을 하고 세계를 구한다고….
first_translate: unless they fall in love, eunis won’t awaken as the saint and save the world...

hangle: 그 방법이 안 될 것 같으니,
이번에 가는 죽은 땅에서 뭔가 힌트라도 얻길 바라는 수밖에….
first_translate: all I can hope for is finding some clues while visiting the land of death this time around...

hangle: 시그렌, 나 잠깐 어디 좀 다녀올게!
first_translate: siegren, I need to step outside for a bit!
to rescue an innocent young woman!

hangle: 혼자 있으니까 조금 마음이 편해지는 기분이야.
first_translate: it feels nice having some alone time without anyone bothering me.

hangle: 행렬에는 사람이 너무 많아서 괜히 지쳐….
first_translate: there were just too many people in the procession, which made me feel tired...
want to play with me for a little bit?
let go of that girl nicely,
then return to where you belong.
who does he think he is?
alright, you come over here too!
apparently, he doesn’t recognize eunis or me.
in that case, I guess I'll show him myself.
there’s no reason for missy to dirty her hands.

hangle: 권터 씨네 사람인 줄은 미처 몰랐습니다.
first_translate: I-I didn’t realize you belonged to mr. gunter.

hangle: 아가씨는 놔드릴 테니 한 번 봐주시죠.
first_translate: I’ll release the lady if you look the other way once.
okay, since we returned the lady safely, we’re leaving--

hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: nope. if I let you guys go free, duke bernhart would kill me.
should I cut off their balls?
